module.name: Music on Hold
module.description: Uploading and management of sound files (wav, mp3) to be used for on-hold music.
module.changelog: *12.0.1* BMO Object *2.11.0.2* Include license file *2.11.0.1* Use rate instead of resample for sox resampling #6347 *2.10.0.2* #5337, #4919 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.1* #4740 *2.9.0.0* 2.9 Update
